title: Nintendo: Next Console, Improving Online, Acquiring Studios - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.05.21
description:
Blessing and Janet round out the news day with a BUNCH of Nintendo news. Let's hear what Nintendo has to say about their next console, Nintendo Online, acquiring studios, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:30 - Housekeeping

Extra Life is happening THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear, a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and me drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:07:50 - Nintendo says it’s still working out the concept and launch timing for its next console - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:24:13 - Nintendo Promises to 'Improve and Expand' the Switch Online Service - Jared Moore @ IGN
00:37:08 - Ad  
00:40:05 - Nintendo Isn't Ruling Out Acquiring Companies, But Will Prioritize Investing In Its Existing Studios - Jared Moore @ IGN
00:49:12 - Forza Horizon 5 Will Add an On-Screen Sign Language Interpreter - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:54:35 - Out today
00:56:33 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Tam
Tues: Tim and Whitta
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Tam and Tim
Fri: Blessing and Janet
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
